name: OpenAI Chat Completions 最小
description: OpenAI Chat Completions API の最小例

files.template:
const r = await fetch('https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ model: '{{model}}', messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Say hello' }] }) });
console.log(await r.json());
